title.native: アルゴナビス from BanG Dream!

description: Ren Nanahoshi is a lonely college student who isn't good at communicating with others. He remembers the thrill of watching a live band perform when he was young, and spent most of his days searching for his own identity. One day, while singing karaoke alone, two boys named Yuuto and Wataru discover Ren's singing ability. The two agree: "This is fate. Let's start a band!" Ren promptly runs away, but fate indeed steps in, and their journey begins.
synonyms: アルゴナビス from BanG Dream! ANIMATION

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nishiki_hiroshi)

He is unilaterally liked by [Kunihiko Ikuhara](https://anilist.co/staff/100082/Kunihiko-Ikuhara). His work on [Revolutionary Girl Utena](https://anilist.co/anime/440/Revolutionary-Girl-Utena/) storyboards were outright claimed to be the "closest to his own style" , in principle, by Ikuhara himself.

An all-male band in the ARGONAVIS project of the BanG Dream! franchise. It is composed of 5 members: [Masahiro Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/150456/Masahiro-Itou) as Ren Nanahoshi on vocals, [Daisuke Hyuga](https://anilist.co/staff/150444/Daisuke-Hyuga) as Yuuto Goryou on guitar, [Seiji Maeda](https://anilist.co/staff/128082/Seiji-Maeda) as Wataru Matoba on bass, [Shouhei Hashimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/134241/Shouhei-Hashimoto) as Banri Shiroishi on drums, and [Shuuta Morishima](https://anilist.co/staff/106743/Shuuta-Morishima) Rio Kikyou on keyboard.

The band was announced shortly before the start of the BanG Dream! 5th☆LIVE. Due to an uproar of worried fans that the characters from Girls Band Party! will have to interact with male characters, Takaaki Kidani, Bushiroad's President, clarified that the male project will not mix and interact with the existing project.

On May 11, 2018, Daisuke, Shuuta, and Seiji  were the first three voice actors to be revealed as part of the project. They announced the joining of Masahiro during their Argonavis 0-2nd LIVE -The Beginning- which they held on September 15, 2018. The last member to join was Shouhei, announced during their Argonavis 0-BEYOND LIVE -The Beginning-.

The name Argonavis is a reference from a large ship named Argo Navis in old Greek mythology, which was a large constellation that no longer exists, as it has been divided into four seperate ones: Vela, Puppis, Carina, and Pyxis, which gathered together and become the ship's head, the Argo. According to Morishima, "Argonavis" is the keyword of the combination of all stars.

(Source: BanG Dream! Wikia, edited)

[Website](http://www.nakamurakou.com/) | [Blog](http://kou.livedoor.biz/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nkkou)

Kou Nakamura is a novelist and winner of the 39th Bungei Prize in 2002. He also won the Noma Literary Newcomer Prize in 2004.

__Likes:__ Fried Chicken and Clams
__Dislikes:__ Tomatoes and Natto

__Introduction:__
Tomoya Tabuchi is a Japanese musician, lyricist, bassist, composer and arranger. He is in charge of the bass and chorus for the three-piece rock band [UNISON SQUARE GARDEN](https://anilist.co/staff/119406/Unison-Square-Garden), and for the rock band [THE KEBABS](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/THE_KEBABS), he also takes part in the [Q-MHz](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q-MHz) music production team.

__Biography:__
Tomoya is the same age as the two other UNISON SQUARE GARDEN members, Kousuke Saito (斎藤宏介) who is also a high school and university classmate, and Suzuki Takao (鈴木貴雄) who is an elementary school classmate. In elementary school, he was obsessed with soccer, to the point that he'd become a "soccer boy". His future dream at the time, was to become a junior league soccer player. Band member Suzuki Takao participated in the same soccer club, as well. When he was in fifth grade of elementary school, he had to move from Funabashi City, Chiba to Setagaya-ku, Tokyo due to his father's work.

In later years he graduated from the Faculty of Political Science and Economics at Waseda University. His specialized field is finance theory.

__Likes:__ Fried Chicken and Clams
__Dislikes:__ Tomatoes and Natto

__Birthplace:__ Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan

__Takuya Watanabe__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger, music producer and guitarist.
__Birthplace:__ Aichi Prefecture, Japan __Uz__ (real name: Yuuji Nakai) is a composer for the band Spyair. He also handles guitar and programming duties.

**[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/shinnosuke_rookiez/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ROOKiEZVo) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@sinobrownofficialshinnosuk4002)**

The vocalist, guitarist, and leader of the Japanese punk rock band [ROOKIEZ is PUNK'D](https://anilist.co/staff/107401/ROOKIEZ-is-PUNKD).

The second all-male band for the project ARGONAVIS from BanG Dream!.

It consists of 5 members: [Jin Ogasawara](https://anilist.co/staff/158184/Jin-Ogasawara) as Nayuta Asahi on vocals, [Shinichi Hashimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/158999/Shinichi-Hashimoto) as Kenta Satozuka and [Takumi Mano](https://anilist.co/staff/158995/Takumi-Mano) as Reon Misono on guitar, [Hiroto Akiya](https://anilist.co/staff/158993/Hiroto-Akiya) as Ryou Akebono on bass, and [Kousuke Miyauchi](https://anilist.co/staff/158997/Kousuke-Miyauchi) as Miyuki Sakaigawa on drums.

(Source: ARGONAVIS from BanG Dream! Wiki)

An all-male band in the ARGONAVIS project of the BanG Dream! franchise. It is composed of 5 members: [Masahiro Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/150456/Masahiro-Itou) as Ren Nanahoshi on vocals, [Daisuke Hyuga](https://anilist.co/staff/150444/Daisuke-Hyuga) as Yuuto Goryou on guitar, [Seiji Maeda](https://anilist.co/staff/128082/Seiji-Maeda) as Wataru Matoba on bass, [Shouhei Hashimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/134241/Shouhei-Hashimoto) as Banri Shiroishi on drums, and [Shuuta Morishima](https://anilist.co/staff/106743/Shuuta-Morishima) Rio Kikyou on keyboard.

The band was announced shortly before the start of the BanG Dream! 5th☆LIVE. Due to an uproar of worried fans that the characters from Girls Band Party! will have to interact with male characters, Takaaki Kidani, Bushiroad's President, clarified that the male project will not mix and interact with the existing project.

On May 11, 2018, Daisuke, Shuuta, and Seiji  were the first three voice actors to be revealed as part of the project. They announced the joining of Masahiro during their Argonavis 0-2nd LIVE -The Beginning- which they held on September 15, 2018. __Guy Nakahira__ is a Japanese mangaka, illustrator and character designer.

Affiliated with Studio Anima.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [background artist](https://anilist.co/staff/156392/)._
**Kitagawa Junko** is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.

__Residence:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Blog](https://hh22.hatenablog.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/dne_bu_hh) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ひらさわひさよし)

Hisayoshi is a sound director and animation producer, and also the chairman of the animation studios [Creators in Pack](https://anilist.co/studio/6072) and [Passione](https://anilist.co/studio/911/Passione).
**Kitagawa Junko** is a Japanese color designer and digital painter.

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).
